courses.title: HTML Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, the foundation of web development, to create structured web pages.

courses.title: CSS for Beginners
courses.description: Start styling your web pages with CSS, the language for controlling the presentation of HTML elements.

courses.title: JavaScript Essentials
courses.description: Enhance your web development skills with essential JavaScript concepts for building interactive websites.

courses.title: React Mastery
courses.description: Master React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, to create dynamic and interactive web applications.

courses.title: Node.js Development
courses.description: Learn Node.js, a server-side JavaScript runtime, to build scalable and efficient web applications.

courses.title: Mobile App Development with React Native
courses.description: Dive into cross-platform mobile app development with React Native, a framework for building native mobile apps using React.

courses.title: Angular Essentials
courses.description: Learn the essentials of Angular, a popular framework for building client-side web applications.

courses.title: Express.js Fundamentals
courses.description: Create robust server-side applications with Express.js, a web application framework for Node.js.

courses.title: MongoDB for Web Developers
courses.description: Explore MongoDB, a NoSQL database, and learn how to use it in web development projects.

courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Discover the techniques of full stack web development to become proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies.
